ing.item: Recipe basic masa dough (see tamales--basic masa dough)
Miso paste; white, yellow, or mellow

directions.step:
Date: Thu, 28 Mar 1996 00:43:27 -0500
From: BobbieB1@aol.com Mix filling ingredients until smooth. Fill and cook tamales according to "Tamales--Basic Masa Dough".
Per serving (2 tamales): 393 cal; 3 g prot; 411 medium sod; 67 g carb; 10 g fat; 0 mg chol; 36 mg calcium
